title: Questions of religion cast abroad in Helvetia by the aduersaries of the same: and aunswered by M. H. Bullinger of Zurick: reduced into .17. common places. Translated into Englishe by Iohn Coxe. 1572
author: Bullinger, Heinrich, 1504-1575.
publisher: By Henrie Bynneman, for George Byshop,
notes: A translation, from the Latin translation of J. Simler, by John Coxe--STC.
Running title reads: Certaine questions of religion.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
